ruleset.name: Basic
ruleset.description: The Basic ruleset contains a collection of good Visual Basic practices which should be followed.

rule.name: NoMyIdentifiers
rule.message: Do not use 'My' or 'my' as part of a variable name
rule.description: Do not use "My" or "my" as part of a variable name. This practice creates confusion with the My objects.

rule.name: ConsistentKeywords
rule.description: Use consistent case for keywords for better code reading. Refer to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ksh7h19t%28v=vs.90%29.aspx for how the keywords should be written.
